purpose: Optimize AI workflows and programs for improved quality, reduced execution latency, and lower costs.
principle: Utilizes autotuning techniques to automatically adjust parameters and configurations in LangChain, LangGraph, and DSPy programs.
reusability: Can be integrated into existing AI workflows with support for LangChain, LangGraph, and DSPy, providing a framework for workflow optimization.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage; may have limited support for certain AI frameworks and lacks comprehensive documentation.
name: cognify
description: Multi-Faceted AI Agent and Workflow Autotuning. Automatically optimizes LangChain, LangGraph, DSPy programs for better quality, lower execution latency, and lower execution cost. Also has a simple agent/workflow framework
